detail_desc: Calf-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist that has a button fastening at one side and decorative buttons at the other. Zip fly and buttons, and straight, wide legs with creases.
Blouse in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front and short, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow cuffs and covered buttons.

Set with a dress and pair of leggings in soft jersey. Dress with long sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Leggings with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the dress and leggings is organic.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in a rib knit with a V-neck at the front, deep V-neck at the back and gently flared skirt.
Knee-length dress in viscose jersey with short cap sleeves, a seam with a drawstring under the bust and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.

Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Soft nursing bra in microfibre with opening, lightly padded cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Knee-length, pleated dress with a rounded neckline, opening and button at the back of the neck, long sleeves and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Unlined.

Straight-cut shirt dress in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Gathers at the shoulders, short cap sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Strapless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a frilled edge at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.
Sleeveless blouse in a soft viscose weave with a narrow collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.

Calf-length dress in an airy jacquard-weave blend made from mulberry silk, linen and Tencel™ lyocell. Round, gathered neckline with a V-shaped opening and ties at the front and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the hem for added width. Unlined.

Set with a long-sleeved top and dungaree dress in soft fabric. Top in cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Dungaree dress in woven fabric with an open chest pocket, concealed press-stud in one side and straps with adjustable buttoning.
Parka in a woven modal blend with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, diagonal zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and button. Unlined.

Slim-fit biker jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Front and back pockets, and legs with decorative stitching and narrow hems.
Sleeveless nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Ankle-length trousers in viscose twill with elastication and a decorative tie at the waist, side pockets and straight legs.
Hoodie in a soft knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood. Kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short dress in jersey with a wrapover front that has ties at one side, short sleeves and a flounce-trimmed hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved, polo-neck top in soft jersey.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft fine knit with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal hair clips with glittery decorations. Width approx. 4.5 cm.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Shirt in checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Shorts in cotton piqué with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in soft jersey made from patterned organic cotton. Press-stud on one shoulder and an open chest pocket.
Dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with plastic beads at the top, a round neckline, short sleeves and gently flared skirt.
Court shoes with pointed toes. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill around the neckline that continues over the shoulder straps, and a decorative bow at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a motif on the front, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Fine-knit polo-neck jumper in soft merino wool with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in soft slub cotton jersey with elasticated ribbing at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Push-up bras in microfibre with mesh details. Underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Large shopper in imitation leather with two handles and a concealed magnetic fastener at the top. One zipped inner compartment. Size 13x40x40 cm.
Shorts in woven fabric. High waist with a sewn-on tie belt at the front and elastication at the back, side pockets and frill-trimmed hems.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved shirt with a bow tie and waistcoat in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Waistcoat with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Long-sleeved bolero in a fine knit with a button at the neck.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jacket in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft, brushed jersey with a small stand-up collar, long, wide raglan sleeves and a straight hem.
Double layered headband in a soft rib knit.
Fully lined, 5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Block-coloured jumper in a soft rib knit with low dropped shoulders, balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey, one in pointelle and one with an all-over print. Small bow at the top and a picot-trimmed flounce that continues over the shoulders. Press-studs at the back of the neck and crotch.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Imitation leather shopper with imitation suede inside, two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. One inner compartment with an additional zipped pocket. Unlined. Size approx. 13x33x41 cm.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Soft cotton jersey leggings in different designs with an elasticated waist.
Ballet pumps with an appliqué and an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Metal rings in various designs, three with sparkly stones.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a decorative frill trim at the hems.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Hoop earrings in silver-plated metal. Wider at the bottom. Length approx. 3 cm.
Short, A-line skirt in a patterned cotton weave with buttons down the front.
Playsuit in patterned jersey with narrow shoulder straps and decorative crossover straps at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.

Cargo shorts in cotton twill with a concealed drawstring at the waist and zip fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a concealed press-stud and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-stud.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides of the legs.
Jacket in imitation suede with imitation leather details, a collar with tabs and metal buckles, a zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Pile lining.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and an elasticated hem. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, chest pockets and side pockets with a flap. Detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Slip-on, fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Short dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and recycled polyester blend. Dropped shoulders, long, voluminous balloon sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

Sports jacket in sturdier, stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with a mesh-lined, drawstring hood. Zip down the front, side pockets and a ventilating mesh section at the top of the back. Soft inside.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Bra in microfibre with lace trims and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Shirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra and a racer back. Sports bra with a double layer of fabric at the front, elasticated hem and opening at the back with crossover straps.

Soft, non-wired nursing bras in soft, stretch fabric with lined cups and a wrapover front for easier nursing access. No fasteners. The bras are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
